name: ABC Baby Zoo Alphabets - Toddler's Preschool Zoo Animals Shapes Jigsaw Educational Splash Puzzles Games For Kids
name_original: ABC Baby Zoo Alphabets - Toddler's Preschool Zoo Animals Shapes Jigsaw Educational Splash Puzzles Games For Kids
description:
Want to teach your toddlers and preschoolers their basic alphabets in an educational yet fun-filled way?
ABC baby Zoo Alphabet is just the app you need!
Features:

● All 26 letters along with really cute animated and interactive animals.
● Extremely pleasant sound effects, music and voice-overs to keep children entertained for hours.
● For ages 3 and above.

Zoo Alphabet for kids not only teaches kids the basic ABCs like many other apps. It is full of colors and pictures to teach them about the animals that begin with that alphabet or letter. For example:

A for Ass
B for Bear
E for Elephant
